Package hippodrome

Class GeneralInformationRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository

  • public class GeneralInformationRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia. This item allows the entities playing at an hippodrome to collect information about the various statuses and snapshots all the instants while something is happening.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String brokerStatus
      Last taken snapshot of the Broker entity.
      private int currentRaceDistance
      Last taken snapshot of the current race distance of track.
      private genclass.TextFile file
      File object file from the external class TextFile which allows us to control a file as IO for the log.
      private java.lang.String filename
      Name of the file where the log is to be saved.
      private HorseJockey[] horseJockeys
      Last taken snapshot of the pairs Horse/Jockey (HorseJockey) entities.
      private java.lang.String lastSnapshotLine
      Last reported status (snapshot) of the logger.
      private int numberOfHorses
      Number of pairs Horse/Jockey to attend the events.
      private int numberOfSpectators
      Number of Spectators to attend the events.
      private boolean onlyLogOnFile
      Flag to control if user wants to have colored information about the system's status on the stdout and simple one on file (behavior activated if false); otherwise, with true, only on file, without colors.
      private int raceNumber
      Last taken snapshot of the race number.
      private Spectator[] spectators
      Last taken snapshot of the Spectator entity.
      private Spectator[] temporarySpectators
      Last temporary taken snapshot of the Spectator entity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GeneralInformationRepository​(int numberOfHorses, int numberOfSpectators, boolean onlyLogonFile)
      Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneralInformationRepository

        public GeneralInformationRepository​(int numberOfHorses,
                                    int numberOfSpectators,
                                    boolean onlyLogonFile)
        Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.
        Parameters:
        numberOfHorses - number of pairs Horse/Jockey to run on track.
        numberOfSpectators - number of Spectators to attend on track.
        onlyLogonFile - flag for deactivate the debug on stdout.

    • Method Detail

      • giveFileAName

        private void giveFileAName​()
        Gives a name to the logging file. This name is constructed with the application name (horse-run) followed by the UNIX timestamp of when this method is executed and the extension .log.

      • printHeaders

        private void printHeaders​()
                   throws InaccessibleFileException
        Print the headers of the log files.
        Throws:
        InaccessibleFileException - if the file does not grant any permission for the current user to be written on. The same behavior could occur if the directory where this file resides cannot be written by the current user.

      • printClassicHeaders

        private void printClassicHeaders​()
                          throws InaccessibleFileException
        Print the headers on a file as the teacher has asked.
        Throws:
        InaccessibleFileException - if the file does not grant any permission for the current user to be written on. The same behavior could occur if the directory where this file resides cannot be written by the current user.

      • setSpectatorStatus

        public void setSpectatorStatus​(int spectatorId,
                               SpectatorState status)
                        throws UnknownSpectatorException
        Sets a new status for the spectatorId Spectator, given by a SpectatorState.
        Parameters:
        spectatorId - the identification of the Spectator.
        status - the current state represented by a SpectatorState enumeration value.
        Throws:
        UnknownSpectatorException - if a Spectator is non-existent and is indexed over our spectators array.

      • setSpectatorAmountOfMoney

        public void setSpectatorAmountOfMoney​(int spectatorId,
                                      int amount)
                               throws UnknownSpectatorException
        Sets a new amount of money for the spectatorId Spectator.
        Parameters:
        spectatorId - the identification of the Spectator.
        amount - the current amount of money represented by a Integer.
        Throws:
        UnknownSpectatorException - if a Spectator is non-existent and is indexed over our spectators array.

      • setSpectatorBetSelection

        public void setSpectatorBetSelection​(int spectatorId,
                                     int selection)
                              throws UnknownSpectatorException
        Sets a new betting selection for the spectatorId Spectator.
        Parameters:
        spectatorId - the identification of the Spectator.
        selection - the current selection of a pair Horse/Jockey represented its identification number.
        Throws:
        UnknownSpectatorException - if a Spectator is non-existent and is indexed over our spectators array.

      • setSpectatorBetAmount

                                  int bet)
                           throws UnknownSpectatorException
        Sets a new betting amount of the spectatorId Spectator.
        Parameters:
        spectatorId - the identification of the Spectator.
        bet - the current betting amount on a pair Horse/Jockey.
        Throws:
        UnknownSpectatorException - if a Spectator is non-existent and is indexed over our spectators array.

        Throws:

      • raceIsOver

        public void raceIsOver​()
        Resets all the statuses of the entities related to a race. This method should be invoked when a race is over.
